from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import json
import calendar
from datetime import datetime, timedelta, date
import pandas as pd

spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
raw_container = "abfss://odw-raw@" + storage_account

if date_folder == '':
    date_folder = datetime.now().date()
else:
    date_folder = datetime.strptime(date_folder, "%Y-%m-%d")

date_folder_str = date_folder.strftime('%Y-%m-%d')


# READ ORCHESTRATION DATA

path_to_orchestration_file = "abfss://odw-config@"+storage_account+"orchestration/orchestration.json"
df = spark.read.option("multiline","true").json(path_to_orchestration_file)
definitions = json.loads(df.toJSON().first())['definitions']


# INGESTING DATA IN /Horizon/

try:
    horizon_source_path = f"{raw_container}Horizon/{date_folder_str}"
    horizon_files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(horizon_source_path)
    for file in horizon_files:
        definition = next((d for d in definitions if d['Source_Filename_Format'] == file.name), None)
        
        if definition:
            expected_from = date_folder - timedelta(days=1)
            expected_from = datetime.combine(expected_from, datetime.min.time())
            expected_to = expected_from + timedelta(days=definition['Expected_Within_Weekdays']) 

            print(f"Ingesting {file.name}")
            ingest_adhoc(storage_account, definition, horizon_source_path, file.name, expected_from, expected_to)

except Exception as e:
    print("An error occurred:", e)
    print('Raw data not present for', date_folder)


# INGESTING DATA IN /Fileshare/SAP_HR/Casework/

casework_source_path = f"{raw_container}Fileshare/SAP_HR/Casework/"
casework_folders = mssparkutils.fs.ls(casework_source_path)
casework_files = []
for folder in casework_folders:
    try:
        files = mssparkutils.fs.ls(f"{casework_source_path}{folder.name}/{date_folder_str}")
        casework_files += files
    except:
        print(f"Raw data not present for {folder.name} for {date_folder}")

for file in casework_files:
    definition = next((d for d in definitions if file.name.replace(date_folder_str.replace('-', '') + '.xlsx', '') in d['Source_Filename_Format']), None)
    if definition:
        expected_from = date_folder - timedelta(days=1)
        expected_from = datetime.combine(expected_from, datetime.min.time())
        expected_to = expected_from + timedelta(days=definition['Expected_Within_Weekdays']) 

        print(f"Ingesting {file.name}")
        ingest_adhoc(storage_account, definition, file.path.replace(file.name, ''), file.name, expected_from, expected_to)
